item.title: Russia’s chemical weapons chief killed in Moscow blast
item.description: Igor Kirillov was the most senior military figure assassinated in Russia yet as the Kremlin's campaign in Ukraine drags on.

item.title: The world’s busiest airline routes in 2024 are largely in Asia
item.description: The Hong Kong to Taipei route is once again the world’s busiest international flight route—a title it last claimed in 2019.

item.title: U.K. faces diplomatic headache with China as President Xi turns up the heat on $327 million plan for lavish new London embassy
item.description: Already rejected by local officials due to its location adjacent to the iconic Tower Bridge, the leader of China has now raised the embassy issue dire...

item.title: Job-hopping vs. staying at one company: What’s the best route to the corner office?
item.description: There are benefits and drawbacks to staying at one company if you’re a CEO aspirant.

item.title: From Red Lobster to Starbucks: How ‘CEO sprinters’ reach the corner office in record time
item.description: Leaders who become CEOs in record time all share three career catalysts.
